extends Object

    • Method Detail

      • compare

        public static <T extends Comparable,I extends Comparable> int compare(T o1,
                                                                      I o2)
        Compares most common types with a int value as difference result
        Type Parameters:
        T - is the type of both comparison candidates
        Parameters:
        o1 - the first candidate for comparison
        o2 - the second candidate for comparison
        Returns:
        0 if both are equal, a positive int value if o1 is bigger than o2 and a negative int value otherwise

        public static <T extends Number,I extends Number> Double add(T o1,

        This method sums up common number values.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of operand 1
        I - type of operand 2
        Parameters:
        o1 - first operand
        o2 - second operand
        Returns:
        the sum of both addends in their common type

        Type Parameters:
        T - type of o1
        I - type of o2
        Parameters:
        o1 - the one to be subtracted from
        o2 - the one that is subtracted from o1
        Returns:
        the subtraction of o2 from o1 in their common type
